actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the tobacco marketing quota provisions of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938.

summary.text: Provides, under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, that farm marketing quotas for burley tobacco may be transferred to other farms in the same county if such county has a current burley tobacco farm poundage quota.

titles.title: A bill to amend the tobacco marketing quota provisions of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938.
